ack.title: Acknowledgements

Long Phi Hoang received funding from the Dutch-Vietnamese Mekong Delta Plan project. Matti Kummu received funding from Academy of Finland project SCART (Grant No. 267463) and Emil Aaltonen foundation (“eat-lesswater” project). Lastly, we thank Professor Georgia Destouni and two anonymous referees for their useful comments and suggestions that helped to improve the paper.
